availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Susan E. Roach. Father of John C. Roach, Henry J. Roach, Mary A. Roach, and Susan E. Roach. Tenant farmer in Ohio County in 1860. Served in 3rd Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a corporal from December 13, 1861 to December 28, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Ellis District, p. 565.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Fordsville District p. 461B.
Organization Index to Pension Files of Veterans Who Served Between 1861 and 1900, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T289 (accessed via Fold 3).
